summary: A command‑line utility that ingests data files (JSONL, JSON, CSV, TSV, XLSX), optionally applies user‑defined prompt/completion templates, cleans the data (duplicate removal, length checks), and outputs a NeMo‑compatible .jsonl dataset with optional train/validation split and short‑context handling, while reporting actionable insights.
business_intent: Enable customers to quickly convert and validate their raw datasets into the required format for NeMo LLM customization, improving training efficiency and reducing preprocessing errors.
